website_summaries.verdict: Stands out for using collagen co-nutrients such as silica and biotin to stimulate the body's own collagen production.
pros: A solid vegan alternative to hydrolyzed collagen
Stands out for offering all of the common ingredients to support skin health in addition to biotin, such as elastin and keratin
cons: Some users noted that it took months of use to begin noticing a difference in their skin, but this is a common attribute to similar supplements

customer_reviews.title: I switched over to this and I’m happy to report i haven’t see any decline in my ...
customer_reviews.text: I used to drink collagen peptides and that helped my hair and nails a TON, but when i became vegan, that of course had to end. I switched over to this and I’m happy to report i haven’t see any decline in my hair/nails. So this works just as good. Or better because I’m not killing animals!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Amerine

customer_reviews.title: Helped slow my hair thinning!
customer_reviews.text: These vitamins are terrific! I was experiencing a LOT of hair shedding and these really have helped. I haven't noticed my hair getting thicker, but I have noticed a huge reduction in my hair loss. Before these vitamins I was taking a hair, skin, and nails supplement that I bought at the grocery store. I also tried thickening shampoo. I was not seeing any results until I took this consistently for a month. My nails are very strong now too! If you found my review helpful, please click Yes below! :)
customer_reviews.author: madeline audreyTop Contributor: Health & Wellness

customer_reviews.title: My nails looked amazing and were really long
customer_reviews.text: These worked really well for the first couple months that I took them. My nails looked amazing and were really long. Now that I’ve been taking them for three or four months they don’t seem to work as well. My nails have gone back to chipping and peeling and my skin lost that great look it had when I first started taking them. I hate that Garden of Life got bought by Nestle right when these seemed like they stopped working. Who knows if my body got used to them, the formula changed or the big evil Nestle came in and messed everything up? Whatever it is I’m going to have to find something new.
customer_reviews.author: Kyra Siebert

customer_reviews.title: Works with only taking half the recommended dose!
customer_reviews.text: First photo was after a much needed trim and taken on 1/5. Second was taken today 3/14. I bought these hair, skin, and nail vitamins but don’t even take them as directed which is 2 a day. I might take 3 or 4 a week and have been noticing how fast my nails are growing because I get manicures every week and a half. If my hair was straightened it would be longer!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Ann

customer_reviews.title: Much better than taking the collagen everyone is offering which does ...
customer_reviews.text: Helps with hair and nails. Much better than taking the collagen everyone is offering which does not work because molecules too big to digest. My hair is fuller and my nails keep growing and are strong. I am 73 years old and appreciate this product so much.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Kay

customer_reviews.title: Gelatin Free
customer_reviews.text: Two tablets a day makes the wrinkles go away! Seriously, I have noticed an improvement in the quality of my skin and hair. I was beginning to develop those nasty little fine wrinkles on my face that have mostly improved after 2 months of using this plant collagen. The tablets are medium size and easy to swallow.
customer_reviews.author: claybaby

customer_reviews.title: Works so well for hair growth
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I've never posted a review on here before but this one works so well I just had to. I've been taking it consistently for two months now and in the last month my hair has grown a little over an inch. My hair stylist was amazed! I'm mainly taking this to get my hair longer and I'm so happy it works.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: My nails and hair always grow super fast when I take Garden of Life Women's formula
customer_reviews.text: My nails and hair always grow super fast when I take Garden of Life Women's formula...so I expect these will be tremendous. I have noticed they seem to kill my appetite...maybe it's the green tea and chromium? I always trust Garden of Life..
customer_reviews.author: Hair88

customer_reviews.title: Excellent plant-based collagen supplement
customer_reviews.text: After taking this product for two weeks, there was a noticible difference in joint mobility throughout my body. I no longer experience popping/cracking noises in my knees, feet, hands and wrists. I’m a vegetarian and this is the best plant-based collagen product I’ve tried.
customer_reviews.author: rcb

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My nails and hair are so strong and long now! Pure product I will continue ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Obed T.

customer_reviews.title: Too bad they sold to Notorious Nestle
customer_reviews.text: I totally love Garden of Life. I am so sad to hear notorious Nestle is buying the company. Will have to look elsewhere for this and so many GOL products I buy
customer_reviews.author: C. Bell

customer_reviews.title: This WORKS!!
customer_reviews.text: This ACTUALLY WORKS!! I have had weak fingernails all my life & recently they got worse, more fragile, in my early 50's. It takes a while to notice effect. I have used this Organic Plant Collagen Builder for over 3 months & started noticing after about 2nd month that not only are my nails stronger, my hair looks better, but it also repaired long-standing ridges & splits that I had in my nails. I am completely floored that it works and will probably take it for at least a year, than see if I can stop taking it and the effects still keep going, but we'll see.
customer_reviews.author: SisterNature

customer_reviews.title: My skin looks great!
customer_reviews.text: My skin has a healthy glow since I started taking this product. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously, this stuff is amazing. I started taking it after surgery because of hair loss. My husband joined in for his skin. We're in our 60's and he has beautiful laugh lines. He also is half on the top of his head. I kid you not, his hair is growing back!!! I can't wait to see what happens over the next year. We've been taking it for about 6 months. Great nails and skin benefits but the hair growth tops them all!
customer_reviews.author: Prof. Grey

customer_reviews.title: Sold out to Nestle'
customer_reviews.text: Wonder plant collagen. So sad I need to find a replacement ad Garden of Life (small operation) sold out to Nestle'.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela J. Spivey

customer_reviews.title: Stolen product
customer_reviews.text: I am probably going to return this product. It appears to have been stolen. There’s a sticker on the box that reads “This item is intended for sale at CVS pharmacy store #5014 and a toll free number. I don’t like being sold merchandise that is stolen.
customer_reviews.author: Gina and Peter Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Helped my lower back
customer_reviews.text: This makes a difference! I have herniated discs to help my back. I have noticed that my nails and hair have grown substantially. More importantly, my back has gotten so much better. I will never stop taking these.
customer_reviews.author: Lilly044

customer_reviews.title: Brought back my hand eczema
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure which of the ingredients contain nickel, but after a week of taking these, my hand eczema returned with a vengeance. I am nickel sensitive, so I will not take these anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Been taking these vitamins for about 4 months and I ...
customer_reviews.text: Been taking these vitamins for about 4 months and I have about 2 inches of hair growth. My hair was falling out from postpartum and I had a thyroid issue, while this didn’t stop the fallout, I did see hair growth after the first month.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: Vegan product! No animal content!
customer_reviews.text: I love this plant based collagen. I would definitely recommend this product if your vegan and looking for the benefits of collagen for hait, skin and nails only. I hope they come out with a powder soon because it's alot easier to add to my shakes in the morning than taking two pills a day.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!!
customer_reviews.text: Besides the size of the pill and the weird taste, these are great!! I've been taking them for about three months but six weeks ago I got ten inches of hair cut off and the stylist cut it WAY too short (ended up being chin length) and I was devastated. I know hair grows back, and in six weeks my hair has grown about an inch. My hair doesn't grow that fast, and taking these has definitely helped it grow. My nails are also really strong. Love that they are vegan and organic. Since they're made from a mix of plants, they don't taste amazing but at least they work!! Wish they weren't made with palm oil though...
customer_reviews.author: suleima

customer_reviews.title: Positive experience so far. Don't split the dose.
customer_reviews.text: I was confused about the flavor rating. We're not suppose to chew or dissolve. Just swallow so why should flavor matter? On the large side so swallowing might be difficult for some. I did notice a difference in my trouble area which is loss of elasticity in my neck. I'm 43 and don't show it anywhere else because of good genes. It's a long skinny neck issue combined with a plant based diet. Anyway, I initially took 2 in the mornings seeing a difference. I decided to try one in the morning and the other at night but results weren't as good if anything. So I'm back to 2 at a time making progress again. I've bought another bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Photog

customer_reviews.title: hair and nails instantly nice. I think because its food-grade the quality of ...
customer_reviews.text: Makes your skin, hair and nails instantly nice. I think because its food-grade the quality of the nutrients your body receives is better, more effective. Ive been taking 10k mcg of biotin for two years with zero results. This gave me results in one month! I will continually buy it until my hair is the length I desire.
customer_reviews.author: C.

customer_reviews.title: Caused flare up of arthritic pain in hands
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this collagen supplement. They seem affordable and it’s hard finding a vegan collagen. After taking these for a week, it dawned on me that every morning I was experiencing a flare up of arthritic-type pain in my hands. I didn’t relate it to the collagen at first so continued to take them for several more days. Once I realized that these could be the culprit, I stopped taking them and the pain went away. There is something in these that caused an arthritis flare up in my hands every single day so for that I cannot recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Vegan Collagen
customer_reviews.text: Ever since I have been taking these vitamins, my nails have been growing out and not breaking as soon as they get long. I have been taking them for about a month. I love these vitamins since I'm vegan and these are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken Tablets - Funky Odor !
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say if this product truly builds collagen, and grows hair /nails because I have only been using it for 10 days. HOWEVER, I recently noticed I recieved a bottle with numerous (almost half the bottle) broken tablets. This says a lot about the manufacturer. Additionally I noticed a funky fishy body odor within day one of taking this. I just read other reviews for this product where customers are complaining about the same thing. I'm beginning to wonder if they are adding fish oil to this product or some other supplement from the sea. Also caused horrible indigestion.
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: They put this on the site before buying! Want a refund!!
customer_reviews.text: Received my product and noticed the extra added ingredient was not good. It have maltodextrin, palm oil and other bad stuff in it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beware! Owned by the Nestle, not effective, causes nausea, huge tablets, almost 2cm lenghth
customer_reviews.text: Highly disappointed and don't recommend to anyone: 1. Huge tablets, hard to swallow without scratching your throat. 2. Made me nauseous even though I've been taking it with the food. 3. Absolutely no improvement in hair and nails growth. 4. Owned by Nestle, the company known as one of the most corrupt corporations ever.
customer_reviews.author: Oktay Babayev

customer_reviews.title: I see such a wonderful smoothing, of my old sun worn skin
customer_reviews.text: I see such a wonderful smoothing, of my old sun worn skin. Great product and ORGANIC! My hair has become super thick as well as my nails growing doubly fast!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Everett

customer_reviews.title: Got this unsealed and short of 15 pcs beware! ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this unsealed and short of 15 pcs beware!!! I opened it after 30 days because I misplaced it too late to return
customer_reviews.author: peacelink

customer_reviews.title: Great supplement- be aware of green tea extract
customer_reviews.text: I really like these supplements and I've been using them consistently now for about 8 months. I feel like it does keep my skin and hair looking healthy (combined with a healthy diet and plenty of sleep). I've noticed that my appetite was getting more and more suppressed. I drink green tea on a regular basis and I'm also very active, so an appetite suppressant was not desirable for me. If you don't drink green tea then this is probably fine for you! I'm cutting down to one a day because I forgot about the Green tea extract!
customer_reviews.author: Savannah

customer_reviews.title: Organic Collagen by Garden of Life is always the best choice.
customer_reviews.text: It's the right one if you are looking for thick beautiful hair, radiant gorgeous skin and healthy looking nails. I will be ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The price keeps going up, not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I took these for months, I even was on the subscription. Then the price kept getting higher I decided to stop taking it and find cheaper options. I never really noticed any difference about me physically while taking them. I just figured it was internally helping, if that makes sense? Since I couldn’t say or list the benefits I’ve noticed while taking it for 4+ months, I knew I needed to give up. Even after stopping I didn’t notice my skin getting worse or my hair falling out. It clearly wasn’t doing much. I just take a multivitamin and biotin now and save about $15.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Marie

customer_reviews.title: I have cystic acne that was currently getting better, I try this for a week and I ...
customer_reviews.text: I have cystic acne that was currently getting better, I try this for a week and I get patches of acne every where!!! If you have sensitive skin I wouldn't suggest this.
customer_reviews.author: Madelaine Clavell

customer_reviews.title: Heartburn
customer_reviews.text: Gave me terrible heart burn. Recommend buying one if the natural collagen gummies instead.
customer_reviews.author: bridgette l

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The pills are huge in size, so if you have difficulty swallowing large pills then don't buy it.
customer_reviews.author: devshikha bose

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff.
customer_reviews.text: Love this collagen in pill form. The powders are a bit tricky for me to ingest. With this one you just swallow a pill and you're done. My nails, skin and hair are definitely much improved.
customer_reviews.author: Couch potato

customer_reviews.title: Fountain of youth in this bottle!!
customer_reviews.text: Ok so this is one of my daily products I never let myself run out of! I’ve suffered with bad acne since a teen and I’m 32 now. I’ve never known an unblemished face until I started using this product. I started taking it to help with my wrinkles.. they were getting bad. After a month I saw such a change in my skin.. hardly any wrinkles at all and not a single blemish on my face.. I’ve been ordering these ever since and won’t let myself run out. If you’re looking for beautiful glowing skin look no further!!
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: Collagen Builder
customer_reviews.text: A bit pricey and I am not seeing the growth of my hair and nails to the magnitude as I did with bovine collagen powder in my coffee every morning, but I do feel better, more energy, not exhausted. I think since these vitamins encourage my own body to produce more of its own natural collagen it is healthier for me. I am down 1/2 the bottle and plan to purchase more to see how it goes.
customer_reviews.author: Justice60

customer_reviews.title: Not so great
customer_reviews.text: I love this at first. But, after a year of using it, it caused extreme dry eye. I know this because I stopped taking it and no dry eye. Once I started taking it again, the dry eye came back. I’ll be looking for a different collagen.
customer_reviews.author: brit25us

customer_reviews.title: Great Company
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if this product works... but I've been taking it for a few months now. My facialist recommends taking an internal collagen builder... so I do. This brand of supplements is excellent however, and love that its vegan.
customer_reviews.author: misty

customer_reviews.title: Beware of Allergens ****
customer_reviews.text: BEWARE of ALLERGENS, I just bought this from Whole Foods through Amazon. I love Garden of life so it seemed right to try this line. NO where it says manufactured in a facility where nuts/peanuts/or shellfish is produced. We are deadly allergic to all those components, cross contamination is a serious business. Do not confuse the term “made without...” as a safe standard. Somebody could easily have an anaphylactic reaction and die because of it. I am very disappointed for not having the entire label showing. This is misleading.
customer_reviews.author: Lorelei

customer_reviews.title: Brought On Worst Breakout in 20 years
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive skin and am extremely careful about my skincare products and the foods I eat. I’ve been taking the collagen builder for three weeks and I’m in the midst of the worst acne breakout of my life since college. I guess when they promised “younger” looking skin, I should have believed it. Be careful what you wish for. I’ve stopped taking this product and I hope my skin calms soon. What a waste.
customer_reviews.author: Scarletbegonia417

customer_reviews.title: Awful acne
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted this product to work. Unfortunately after only 1 wk of taking it as directed, I developed terrible acne. I am in my 40’s and never had acne issues in my life. As soon as I stopped taking it, acne went away. Very dissapointed it didn’twork for me! I have used this brand with great results for (Omega 3) but I this one for me is a NOooo!
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Great Product. Really Works!
customer_reviews.text: I noticed a difference within two weeks. Im on my second bottle. My nails are so white and growing fast. There starting to be thicker and hard too. Very easy to swallow. I also take the multi vitamin as well. I recommend all their products.
customer_reviews.author: peppercorn

customer_reviews.title: Result Already!
customer_reviews.text: I've used these for 6 weeks and so far I'm very pleased with the quality and results. My nails are longer and stronger than I've ever experienced. I think I'll need more time to determine impact its has on my hair growth.
customer_reviews.author: Elle S.

customer_reviews.title: Constant repurchase
customer_reviews.text: I like this product very well. I kept on repurchasing it for the effect on my skin is so evident especially with the collagen as it helps lessen visible fine lines. The moment I stopped though, the fine lines reappeared. The reason why I gave it 4 stars is because some it the tablets are broken in halves.
customer_reviews.author: M Bautista

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: Tried this for hair regrowth. Took faithfully. Did not see any results. This was on the pricy side, so I will continue my search for a supplement that will help me with my thining hari.
customer_reviews.author: laura

customer_reviews.title: Thicker Hair!
customer_reviews.text: I have always had fine hair but I bought this mainly for stronger nails. I finished a bottle and when I went for a haircut, my stylist said -your hair is noticably thicker, what have you been doing?! Needless to say, I ordered more.
customer_reviews.author: A. Graham

customer_reviews.title: naturally derived form fruits and veggies
customer_reviews.text: love that all the vitamins/minerals in this product are naturally derived form fruits and veggies. Vegan god send. Been taking for a month now with no side effects or visible difference. Will continue and update the review after the other bottle has been depleted.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to animal-based collagen!!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I have been taking these for 3 months and loved them. We were looking for a plant-based collagen to replace our animal-based collagen and this is EXACTLY what we were looking for! Our hair and nails are growing like crazy and my skin feels healthier.
customer_reviews.author: Ali Y.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this product but I just couldn’t. I noticed my skin was breaking out after a couple of weeks of taking this. At first I thought it was because of wearing a mask due to Covid but I hadn’t had breakouts since COVID-19 started and I don’t have to wear a mask often/for long periods of time. I tested it theory by stopping the supplement and noticed my skin starting to clear after one day of not taking it.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Behrer

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: I think it's the dextrose making it too sweet I like to chew my or suck on them to blend with my saliva to hit my system faster but all I taste is sweets. Besides that the ingredients are good very few plant products with standard bamboo. I wont repurchase!
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: No improvement.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my wife. After 6 weeks her nails were cracking more, hair frizzing and skin not improved. No evidence of Collagen. Building. She returned to her old “hair, skin and nails” product and things are improving noticeably. Also, too much vitamin A to take along with your multivitamin.
customer_reviews.author: Rickus22

customer_reviews.title: Helpful but had allergic reaction to an ingredient
customer_reviews.text: I took these for two weeks and I was getting hot flashes and my face would turn beet red so I quit taking them. Otherwise, I did notice in the 2 weeks of taking them my finger nails were growing and stronger than usual.
customer_reviews.author: T.

customer_reviews.title: Actually works!
customer_reviews.text: I have already ordered this product twice and will be ordering my third bottle soon. My nails have never been thicker, my hair is noticeably growing and getting thicker, and my cuticles are noticeably growing and gaining thickness as well. I am very happy with the results of this product only after a couple of months. I would highly recommend using this product if you want to see a difference in your hair and nail growth. I would also recommend using a collagen shampoo and conditioner and drink lots of water throughout your day! You will not regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Leassear

customer_reviews.title: Good substitute for vegetarians seeking a collagen boost
customer_reviews.text: These are a great brand. I’ve used many of their other supplements with success so when my Dr said we needed to take beef, dairy, collagen and any other cow derivatives this was my first pick. I love that they use a whole food approach to supplements and I wouldn’t want it any other way. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Allison & Nick

customer_reviews.title: It seen to work in a slow way i see ...
customer_reviews.text: It seen to work in a slow way i see difference in about 7 to 10 days after using it. If you want a 100% vegan way this is it. Always used with food and water. This way you dont burps weird flavors...
customer_reviews.author: Julio Romero Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Reversed my aging and blemishes, Under eye circles
customer_reviews.text: One of the best supplements I have ever purchased on Amazon. After two weeks, I really started to notice a difference in my skin. My dark spots disappeared, dark eye circles reduced, and under eye wrinkles are now disappearing! I used to work for Estée Lauder, and these pills do wonders for my skin without being as expensive. I feel like I’m reversing in aging. I also drink plenty of alkaline water.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: They do have a smooth coating but i still found them hard to swallow. They seemed to make my stomach hurt after a couple of weeks. I did not take the recommended twice a day, i only took them once a day and after food. Just didn't work out for me. I of course did not take them long enough to notice any changes.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Herring

customer_reviews.title: ... using them a short time but my skin looks better already! And my hair does seem like its ...
customer_reviews.text: Only been using them a short time but my skin looks better already! And my hair does seem like its growing for the first time in a few years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great vitamin, but I am a clutz
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I was only able to take a few of these vitamins because I dropped the bottle and it shattered everywhere. I like the idea of glass bottles because I am sure it keeps the vitamins fresher longer... but it is a shame that one drop can completely ruin an entire purchase. I didn't take them long enough to notice a difference. Since I am a clutz, I will most likely opt for vitamins without glass packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Kim S

customer_reviews.title: Hair has grown!
customer_reviews.text: Been talking these since July. It is now October. My hair always capped out just past my shoulders. I used to take straight collagen to no avail. I want to say since starting this at only one pill a day my hair has grown at least 2 inches. Maybe a little more. My skin looks good too. It works.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended.
customer_reviews.text: I started these in November, and so I haven’t noticed not even the slightest improvement. It just doesn’t seem like it did anything for me.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: That is all I have to say! With lifestyle makings... a person like myself sees results within THREE MONTHS!!! Especially in the hair and skin family (called "integument"). Body definitely craved the family of foods that are in and thrives off the alchemical gold in it! Adding healthy fats was key for me personally.
customer_reviews.author: Beliala Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: No improvement yet
customer_reviews.text: Been using 2 months and don’t see any difference in hair or nails. Will use 1 more month and if there is no improvement I will cancel my subscription.
customer_reviews.author: Mary L

customer_reviews.title: My face glows
customer_reviews.text: My skin glows when I consistently take this product, love it!
customer_reviews.author: Ajia

customer_reviews.title: FOREVER A CUSTOMER OF THIS COLLAGEN
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE VEGAN AND PLANT BASE AND THESE I GOT THEM YESTERDAY AND I ALREADY LOVE THEM THANK YOU SELLER AND AMAZON WILL BE PURCHASING THEM EVERY MONTH FINALLY A GREAT PLANT BASE COLLAGEN SUPPLEMENT I BELIVE IN PLANT BASE AND WHOLE FOODS BECAUSE I RESPECT MY BODY AND MY BODIES NEEDS
customer_reviews.author: VANESSA LOPEZ

customer_reviews.title: Grows Hair But Gave Me Acne
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time trying a collagen supplement + it did not disappoint me. My hair has grown a little longer than usual. My nails are stronger too. The only downfall is the acne flare ups. I've never had acne until I started taking these pills. I may stop taking them because the acne is horrible!
customer_reviews.author: Oohlala

customer_reviews.title: Garden of Life liquid collagen
customer_reviews.text: I like the product. Pleasant taste and i did see a difference in my hair, nails and skin.
customer_reviews.author: MashkaSJB

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS A WONDERFUL PRODUCT, HAVE TRIED MANY OTHERS, THIS ONE REALLY WORKS, MY HAIR LOOKS HEALTHIER, THE SHEDDING STOPPED AND I EVEN THINK IS MAKING MY HAIR LOOK STRONGER AND THICKER.
customer_reviews.author: Bunnychinx

customer_reviews.title: I love vegan product
customer_reviews.text: These brand of medicine it really work well with In a couple of weeks, and notice that my hair is growing is so fast . I am so happy for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Anshika

customer_reviews.title: Vegetarian Collagen
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to try collagen to help my skin as I age but was not willing to use animal based products due to concerns with Celiacs (I have issues if animals are not grass fed). It also felt healthier to use veggie based. I love this product - my skin is really improving after two weeks of use.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Gilligan

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend for strong hair and nails!
customer_reviews.text: Great, high quality collagen supplement. My nails and hair have never felt stronger or better. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: JAMM

customer_reviews.title: Huge pills
customer_reviews.text: These pills are huge! And you have to take two ugh they are hard to swallow and I haven’t really noticed a difference in my hair skin or nails. I bought them because they are organic but they are pretty expensive and I don’t enjoy them. I really wanted to like this brand but I’ve tried 5 of their products so far and haven’t liked any of them :(
customer_reviews.author: #1 Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Still love them.
customer_reviews.text: I still love these. I've been taking these for years now. I've noticed I don't get sick nearly as often.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Noble

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Great and so many great and organic ingredients. I just didnt buy it again cause I'm on a budget and is a little too high right now for me, I do recommend if you care about what goes into your body.. Also a vegan vitamin! Hope to get them again soon!
customer_reviews.author: Liv

customer_reviews.title: Work wonderfully!
customer_reviews.text: I could tell this started working within the first couple of weeks. I trimmed about 2 inches off my hair and it grew back faster than usual. Overall my hair has gotten healthier. My eye lashes aren't longer, but they are thicker! If you have a lot of breakage you most likely have hard water. I suggest getting a water softer adapter for your shower head. I got one and in conjunction with these pills my hair has improved so much!
customer_reviews.author: y

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product! Due to the high levels of B ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! Due to the high levels of B viramins my utinr was a bright almost neon yellow, but that is normal when your body excretes the extra.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They work!!
customer_reviews.text: Ok the vitamin is big to swallow but I just swallow one at a time. So worth it because they work! I’ve been on these for 4months and my nails are stronger and my hair is thicker. I’m 48 so I needed this boost and it’s organic! Love this product! Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel K

customer_reviews.title: It takes some time to notice new hair growth. I have been u taking these vitamins for about a year. Collagen takes time to build
customer_reviews.text: This product does what it says. Good organic vitamins to support collagen growth.
customer_reviews.author: CD

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth buying
customer_reviews.text: After two weeks I noticed a change in my hair, skin, and nails. My hair felt thicker and my nails were stronger. My skin feels softer and firm.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: I took these for 3 weeks. The flavor isn’t great but I just swallow them. Didn’t see any improvement in my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Goa

customer_reviews.title: Brighter, smoother skin
customer_reviews.text: I started taking this and within a week I saw brighter, smoother skin. I have taken other hair, skin and nails supplements but I was mostly taking them for my skin. This seems to help my skin the most of any supplement.
customer_reviews.author: Dixie Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Great for vegans, but it’s a just fancy multivitamin
customer_reviews.text: Quality vitamin, but if you compare the vitamins in the product to another multivitamin from a health food store, it’s essentially the same thing with a bit more biotin... invest in a multivitamin and some biotin and you’ll get the same results for less money
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Kozora

customer_reviews.title: Broken tablets
customer_reviews.text: I have been ordering this for a very long time. This last bottle that I received has broken tablets. Never experienced this. Not happy. I want it replaced.
customer_reviews.author: NV

customer_reviews.title: Worst product
customer_reviews.text: It did nothing but gave me acne in return. I have sensitive skin and my goodness after using it for one week I got so much acne which I never had before . And I don’t see any difference in hair fall too.. This is the worst product I ever got. Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Chandrasekhar

customer_reviews.title: Happy & Healthy
customer_reviews.text: I take these daily I believe they are working to advance my beauty regimen. I see an improvement in my nails especially. Not my first purchase with Garden of Life, the company products ingredients are always exceptional.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product. I can tell a huge difference in a month with my skin. You can’t go wrong here! Highly recommend trying.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Zornes

customer_reviews.title: I just didnt see a difference
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews and comparing to similar products, I opted for this one. Seemed like a smart idea to help my bod make collagen vs. forcing collagen into it. After a full bottle, I don't see any noticeable difference. (this month didn't have any major changes elsewhere, so I figured I'd see something) Oh well, back to shopping.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea K Helton

customer_reviews.title: The toilet will be your best friend.
customer_reviews.text: Took this for the first time last night and was up all night with SEVERE diarrhea.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waiting for a positive response
customer_reviews.text: I read all the great reviews and purchased this. After a few days, I started getting pimples on my jaw. My already existing marks are still there. Hairfall has not reduced. But am ready to give it tume. Just upset that I broke out after a few days. Skeptical about purchasing the next bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Saw no benefit
customer_reviews.text: Tried for 3 continuous months. Did not see any apparent difference. Also annoying that 2 pills is one dose. I take other vitamins already so maybe these just added nothing additional.
customer_reviews.author: ct

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love Garden of Life products! My fingernails are strong and growing like crazy! I believe my facial skin has improved as far as fine lines etc
customer_reviews.author: kat58

customer_reviews.title: WOULD BUY IT AGAIN AND AGAIN
customer_reviews.text: REALLY WORKS. NAILS ARE GROWING STRONGER AND FASTER, ALMOST NO HAIR LOSS.
customer_reviews.author: YAUHENIYA VAINOVICH

customer_reviews.title: Love em!
customer_reviews.text: Love all Garden of Life products. I always know I'm getting clean ingredients with this brand. Like all vitamins, they're not the most pleasant tasting, but these are smaller than my daily vitamin and easy to swallow.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: They’re pretty large pills but I am fine with that, maybe not for people who can’t swallow pills. but I really do feel like they made me hair and nails stronger. Will definitely keep using.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay duus

customer_reviews.title: The pill size is also very large and I didn't like having to take them twice a day
customer_reviews.text: I have clear skin but taking these pills caused me to break out within a week! I stopped taking them and ordered Biotin from another company to try instead. The pill size is also very large and I didn't like having to take them twice a day.
customer_reviews.author: B. Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: I must say that after running out of vitamins for a few weeks, I can see the difference when I don’t take them. My nails feel so much stronger when I am taking these vitamins, and my complexion is noticeably different. I personally feel they help.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Modern way of building good bone health
customer_reviews.text: This product is plant based , its in a pill form, easy to administer when traveling, no after taste and its great for good bone health . 5-pluses equals superb.
customer_reviews.author: martha martinez

product_meta.title: Garden of Life mykind Organic Plant Collagen Builder - Vegan Collagen Builder for Hair, Skin and Nail Health, 60 Tablets Packaging May Vary
product_meta.description: There are many collagen products on the market, but my kind organics organic plant collagen builder is certified usda organic, non-gmo project verified, made only from organic plant foods-and can build the body's own natural production of collagen. You can't build collagen by eating collagen. Collagen is a protein that is broken down by the digestive system. What you can do is feed your body the necessary co-nutrients needed for building collagen, such as those found in organic plant collagen builder. Made from over 30 real, nutritious organic, family-farmed whole foods, with specifically chosen ingredients to help support the body's own collagen production-organic plant collagen builder can help restore and maintain youthful levels of collagen, keratin and elastin-three proteins which promote the body's healthy, natural glow. Organic plant collagen builder contains silica from certified organic all natural bamboo extract which is a key co-nutrient for collagen production. Also included is high polyphenolic pomegranate to support skin health and protection from uv damage. Organic rooibos and organic green tea are known to fight free radicals which can support healthy, glowing skin, healthy teeth and bones. Then there's "beauty-boosting biotin" to support healthy hair, skin and nails.
feature_bullets: SILICA SUPPLEMENT: mykind vegan collagen hair supplement helps build the body's own natural production of collagen with collagen co nutrients such as silica for beautiful hair, skin and nails
YOUTHFUL GLOW: Our collagen supplement helps restore and maintain youthful levels of collagen, keratin and elastin
POLYPHENOLS: Our plant sourced collagen builder includes High Polyphenolic Pomegranate to support skin health and protect against UV damage
BEAUTY BOOSTING BIOTIN: 1,500 milligrams whole food biotin from organic sesbania and antioxidants from organic pomegranate, turmeric, amla, green and rooibos tea support healthy skin, teeth and bones
ORGANIC VITAMIN: Our collagen pills are certified USDA Organic, Non GMO project Verified, Vegan Certified, Gluten Free Certified, Kosher Made (Star K)

specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
